metadata.feature_description: View and manage all unpublished posts including drafts and posts under review

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: News page loads with Publisher module visible
steps.actual: News page loaded successfully showing published posts and edit bar

steps.action: View the Unpublished posts panel via edit bar
steps.expected: Unpublished panel should show with list of unpublished posts
steps.actual: Unpublished panel displayed showing table with NAME, DATE CREATED, AUTHOR, ACTIONS columns and two unpublished posts

steps.action: Verify unpublished posts data displayed correctly
steps.expected: Each post should show title, creation date, author, and action links
steps.actual: Posts displayed correctly: 'Workflow Test - Submit for Review' (2/28/2026 1:14 AM, SuperUser Account) and 'Test Post Creation - Feature Testing' (2/28/2026 1:13 AM, SuperUser Account)

steps.action: Look for filter controls in Unpublished panel
steps.expected: Filter dropdown or controls to filter by status (draft/review) should be present
steps.actual: No filter controls found in the UI. The Unpublished panel only shows a simple table without any filtering options

issues: Filter by status (draft/review) functionality is not implemented in the UI. Code review confirms UnpublishedPosts.ascx only displays a static table without filtering controls.

steps.action: Look for sort controls in Unpublished panel column headers
steps.expected: Column headers should be clickable to sort posts by date or other columns
steps.actual: Column headers (Name, Date created, Author, Actions) are not clickable and do not provide sorting functionality

issues: Sort functionality is not implemented. The table displays posts in order returned from database but does not provide interactive sorting in the UI.

steps.action: Look for bulk selection checkboxes or controls
steps.expected: Checkboxes should be present to select multiple posts for bulk actions
steps.actual: No bulk selection checkboxes or multi-select functionality found in the Unpublished panel

issues: Bulk selection feature is not implemented in the Unpublished Posts Management UI.

steps.action: Hover over Actions column to reveal action links
steps.expected: View and Edit action icons should appear
steps.actual: View Post and Edit Post icons appeared on hover in the Actions column

steps.action: Click Edit Post link for 'Workflow Test - Submit for Review'
steps.expected: Edit page should open for the selected post
steps.actual: Edit page opened at URL /en-us/News/view/edit/Workflow-Test-Submit-for-Review showing the post content, title 'Workflow Test - Submit for Review' and content editable

steps.expected: Post title, content, and metadata should be editable
steps.actual: Edit page showed upload file area, editable title field, editable content paragraph, and Edit Post Details panel with Title, Description, URL, Featured checkbox, and Tags fields

steps.action: Access edit page for unpublished post and verify delete option
steps.expected: Delete option should be available from the edit page
steps.actual: Edit page editbar shows delete icon (trash can) as the first button on the left side, confirming delete functionality is accessible from the unpublished post edit view

steps.action: Look for workflow state information in unpublished posts list
steps.expected: Each post should show its workflow state (draft, pending review, etc.)
steps.actual: The Unpublished panel table does not show workflow state information. Only Name, Date created, Author, and Actions columns are displayed - no workflow/status column exists

issues: Workflow state details are not displayed in the Unpublished Posts Management panel. The UI does not indicate whether a post is a draft or under review.

steps.action: Look for export functionality in Unpublished panel
steps.expected: Export button or option should be available to export the list
steps.actual: No export functionality found in the Unpublished Posts Management panel

issues: Export unpublished posts list functionality is not implemented in the UI.

observations: Code review of UnpublishedPosts.ascx reveals the feature is a simple slide-out panel that displays unpublished posts in a static HTML table with Knockout.js bindings.
The panel only displays: Name (title), Date created, Author name, and Actions (View/Edit links) - no filtering, sorting, bulk selection, or export capabilities.
Posts limit is configurable via portal setting 'Publisher_MaxNumberUnpublishedPostsToBeShown' with default of 25 posts.
The Unpublished Posts button only appears in List view mode when AnyUnpublishPosts flag is true.
View action links to the post detail page, Edit action links to the edit page where full editing capabilities exist including delete.
Workflow state information (draft vs review) is not surfaced in the unpublished posts list UI, though posts in different workflow states are included in the list.
Filter by status, sort by date, bulk selection, and export features mentioned in test scenarios are NOT implemented in the current UI - these would require code enhancements.
